And the communication was great, you updated me every step of the way!

name: happybrutalist
review: Was a great pleasure working with Abeera. Very communicative, asked all the questions she needed before pursuing the work. Was happy to make changes and try out different ideas. Bonus points for knowing I was in a rush and taking care of grammar and spelling errors for me. Highly recommended and will definitely work with her again.

name: alex
review: Very impressed rewritten by Abeera, thank you so much for your nice work!!

name: sweet_diana
review: Words cannot merely express how grateful I was after receiving the finalization of my project. Tears flowed deeply as I gazed at the beautiful, touching, and magical book created by the absolute best seller in the world! She went above and beyond in creating this personalized book in a way that it will be remembered for years to come, and that was my sole purpose! My Goddaughter will hold on to this treasure with such grace, and I can't describe the feeling any better than that! Thank you so much for your professionalism, creativity, and, most importantly, for exceeding my expectations! You are greatly appreciated, and I am looking forward to doing business with you in the future.
